title.rendered: Mukesh Ambani’s property value increased by 24% in One Year

content.rendered:
Mukesh Ambani’s property value has increased by 24 per cent in one year. Adani’s net worth rose to Rs 3.74 lakh crore in a year. Following this, Mukesh Ambani has topped the list of richest men in Asia.

Millionaires are listed under the title ‘Harun Global Rich List’. A total of 3,381 millionaires are listed from 2557 companies in 69 countries. Reliance Industries chairman Mukesh Ambani topped the list. His net worth is Rs 7.86 lakh crore.

Gautam Adani, Chairman of the Adani Group, is ranked 2nd on the list. His net worth is Rs 6.18 lakh crore. Balkuni Nair, the founder of NICA, has topped the list for the first time. Mukesh Ambani’s property value has increased by 24 per cent in one year. Adani’s net worth rose to Rs 3.74 lakh crore in a year. In the last one year, the value of his assets has increased by Rs 6000 crore per week.

Of the millionaires on this list, 2071 have increased their property value in one year. The property value of 942 millionaires has plummeted. 490 millionaires are newly added to this list. Of the millionaires on this list, 258 are in India. Of these, 58 are new entrants. India is the 3rd largest producer of millionaires in the world.

excerpt.rendered: Mukesh Ambani’s property value has increased by 24 per cent in one year. Adani’s net worth rose to Rs 3.74 lakh crore in a year.
